title: How I'm planning my fall/winter garden
description: The step-by-step process I used to produce my favorite fruits and vegetables this fall.
body:
## Inspiration
I started by getting inspiration for what is possible month-to-month in my area. I googled `Edibles by month in North Florida`, which resulted in some very helpful graphics from my local University's IFAS extension.

Taking these I was able to figure out when I could start thinking about planting and some options for what to plant. Through June, my options are limited to Sweet Potatoes. Come July, I can start looking at peppers.

Now that I know what's possible, I can look for specific varieties I am interested in. So I'm navigating to the [peppers category](https://www.johnnyseeds.com/vegetables/peppers/) and finding what looks interesting.

I'm seeing lunchbox peppers
